page.title: 19ANNUAL EVENTS IN LT.GADDESD.
page.content: The Maypole takes place at School.The May Queen is crowned;St.George kills the dragon and the children dance the Maypole and Morris Dance.At the end the Queen throws toffees for everyone. The Art Exhibition is held in the Village Hall.People put in paintings and judges elect the best one. In the Fun Run about 120 to 200 people run. They run 6 miles across country for charity. The Sausage and Mash takes place at School.Adults and children gather in the School Hall where tables have been laid.There is a meal,a singsong and social. The Conservative Fete takes place on the Village Green.There are lots of stalls set up.There is a marquee in which you buy refreshments. The V.P.A. Winter and Summer shows take place in the Village Hall, in which people put lots of models,cakes and vegetables etc.
